TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Attribute extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._Attribute

summary.span: 表示自定义特性的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将预定义的系统信息或用户定义的自定义信息与目标元素相关联。The class associates predefined system information or user-defined custom information with a target element. 目标元素可以是程序集、类、构造函数、委托、枚举、事件、字段、接口、方法、可移植可执行文件模块、参数、属性、返回值、结构或其他属性。A target element can be an assembly, class, constructor, delegate, enum, event, field, interface, method, portable executable file module, parameter, property, return value, struct, or another attribute. 特性提供的信息也称为 "元数据"。Information provided by an attribute is also known as metadata. 您的应用程序可以在运行时查看元数据，以控制程序处理数据的方式，或在运行之前由外部工具控制以控制您的应用程序本身的处理方式。Metadata can be examined at run time by your application to control how your program processes data, or before run time by external tools to control how your application itself is processed or maintained. 例如，.NET Framework 预定义，并使用属性类型来控制运行时行为，某些编程语言使用属性类型来表示 .NET Framework 通用类型系统不直接支持的语言功能。For example, the .NET Framework predefines and uses attribute types to control run-time behavior, and some programming languages use attribute types to represent language features not directly supported by the .NET Framework common type system. 所有属性类型都直接或间接从 类派生。All attribute types derive directly or indirectly from the class. 特性可应用于任何目标元素;可以将多个属性应用于同一目标元素;和属性可由派生自目标元素的元素继承。Attributes can be applied to any target element; multiple attributes can be applied to the same target element; and attributes can be inherited by an element derived from a target element. 使用 类指定应用该属性的目标元素。Use the class to specify the target element to which the attribute is applied. 类提供了检索和测试自定义属性的便利方法。The class provides convenient methods to retrieve and test custom attributes. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[应用特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)和[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md) and [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 的用法。The following code example demonstrates the usage of . [!code-cpp[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/CPP/customattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/CS/customattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/VB/customattribute.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用反射来检索当前实例的字段信息和 `obj` 参数。The method uses reflection to retrieve field information for the current instance and the `obj` argument. 然后，它将对字段值进行比较。It then compares field values. 实现自己的派生自 的类时，可以重写 方法。When implementing your own class derived from , you can override the method. 由于它使用反射，因此我们建议您这样做。Because it uses reflection, we recommend that you do so. 但是，重写应执行引用相等性的标准测试（两个参数表示相同的对象实例）或值相等性（两个参数的类型相同，并且具有相同的字段值）。However, your override should perform a standard test for reference equality (the two arguments represent the same object instance) or value equality (the two arguments are of the same type and have identical field values). 如果要执行自定义比较来确定两个属性对象是否相等，可以重写 方法。If you want to perform a custom comparison to determine whether two attributes objects are equal, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了两个自定义参数 类，然后创建每个类的几个对象并使用 方法对它们进行比较。The following example defines two custom parameter classes, then creates several objects of each class and uses the method to compare them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的默认实现将返回 `false`，且必须在派生类中实现才能对该类有用。The default implementation of this class returns `false`, and must be implemented in the derived class to be useful to that class. 此方法在派生类中的实现将此实例的值与标准默认值进行比较，并返回一个布尔值，该值指示此实例的值是否等于标准值。The implementation of this method in a derived class compares the value of this instance to a standard default value, then returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the value of this instance is equal to the standard value. 标准值通常编码为实现中的常数，或以编程方式存储在实现使用的字段中。The standard value is typically coded as a constant in the implementation, or stored programmatically in a field used by the implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 。The following code example illustrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法确定一个 是否等于另一个。This method determines if one equals another. 其默认实现与 相同，它确定两个特性是否属于同一类型并且具有相同的字段值。Its default implementation is the same as , which determines whether two attributes are of the same type and have the same field values. 通常， 方法用于执行引用或值相等性的标准测试。In general, the method is intended to perform a standard test for reference or value equality. 如果要执行相等性比较，而不是这两个属性实例属于同一类型并且具有相同的值，则可以重写 方法。You can override the method when you want to perform a custom comparison for equality that is based on some criteria other than that two attribute instances are of the same type and have identical values. 例如，可以重写 方法，以便在以下方案中比较特性：For example, you can override the method to compare attributes in the following scenarios: - 如果设置了某个特定的位，则属性包含位域，并将两个属性实例视为相等。An attribute includes a bit field, and you consider two attribute instances equal if a particular bit is set. 例如，`NumericDisplay` 属性可能包含一个位域，指示客户端支持的数字格式（如 binary、八进制、十进制和十六进制）。For example, a `NumericDisplay` attribute might include a bit field that indicates what numeric formats (such as binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal) a client supports. 如果重写的 方法支持同一数字格式，则可能会将两个实例视为相等。The overridden method might consider two instances equal if they support the same numeric format. - 属性包含多个字段，这些字段包含相同类型的信息，或包含一个可按任意顺序进行值的数组。An attribute includes multiple fields that contain the same kind of information, or it contains an array in which values can be in any order. 例如，`Author` 属性可能包含作者姓名的多个字段。For example, an `Author` attribute might include multiple fields for author names. 如果两个实例具有相同的作者，而不考虑每个字段是否与相应的字段相等，则重写的 方法可能会认为这两个实例相等。The overridden method might consider two instances equal if they have the same authors regardless of whether each field is equal to the corresponding field. ## 示例Example 下面的示例演示如何使用 来创建属性值的自定义比较方法。The following example illustrates the use of to create a custom comparison method for attribute values. 如果定义一个 `AuthorsAttribute`，该内部包含存储作者姓名的 `List`。If defines an `AuthorsAttribute` that internally contains a `List` that stores authors' names. 由于名称可以在列表中以任意顺序出现，因此它将覆盖 方法以比较作者姓名，而不考虑其在列表中的位置。Because the names can occur in any order in the list, it overrides the method to compare author names regardless of their position in the list. 请注意 方法，该方法执行值相等性测试，并从 方法返回不同的结果。Note the method, which performs a test for value equality, returns different results from the method.
